features.title: Advanced Event Planning Tools
features.description: Our platform offers a variety of smart tools that will assist you at every stage from planning your event to managing it in real time.

venue.title: Perfect Venue Selection
venue.description: Find the ideal venue for your event with smart filtering by location, budget, guest capacity and atmosphere. Discover halls, event gardens and unique places that perfectly match your requirements, get personalized recommendations, and compare different options in one place.

vendors.title: Smart Vendor Management
vendors.description: Manage all your vendors in one place - music, catering, photography, design and more. Compare price quotes, save important documents and manage efficient communication with all parties involved. The system alerts you to important deadlines and helps you track planning progress.

guests.title: Smart Guest List
guests.description: Easily manage guest lists, send personalized digital invitations and track RSVPs in real time. Our smart tool helps you stay in touch with guests before and after the event, collect menu preferences, and manage related events such as bachelor/bachelorette parties or henna ceremonies.

seating.title: Intuitive Seating Arrangements
seating.description: AI algorithm for optimal seating arrangement for your guests, taking into account family dynamics, personal preferences and special needs. The interactive interface allows you to easily plan and change seating arrangements, share with family members for feedback, and export detailed diagrams to vendors.

timeline.title: Precise Schedule Management
timeline.description: Plan your event with a smart schedule for each stage. Get alerts for payment deadlines, vendor meetings and important tasks. Our tool ensures you don't miss any important detail on the way to the perfect event, offers pre-made templates for efficient handling, and allows sharing the schedule with family or a professional event planner.

budget.title: Smart Budget Management
budget.description: Track your budget and event expenses in real time. Our smart tool helps you focus on what really matters, identify places to save and ensure you stay within your defined budget. Get insights into spending patterns, compare price quotes, and receive alerts when approaching budget limits.

process.title: Simple and Effective Planning Process
process.description: From the initial idea to the day of the event, the PlanIt system accompanies you every step of the way

step1.title: Define Your Event
step1.description: Create an account with PlanIt and define the type of event, date, number of guests and budget. The system will adapt itself to your specific needs and create a personal work plan.

step2.title: Choose Venue and Vendors
step2.description: The system will suggest personalized options for venues and vendors that match your requirements and budget. You can compare prices, read reviews, and make informed decisions in one place.

step3.title: Manage Invitations and Guests
step3.description: Send custom designed digital invitations, track RSVPs, and manage special notes such as menu preferences or special needs. The system centralizes all information in one place and enables easy communication with guests.

step4.title: Final Planning and Logistics
step4.description: Design seating arrangements, final coordination with vendors and build a detailed schedule for the event day. The system ensures that all the small details are taken care of and that everything is ready for the big day.

step5.title: Real-time Event Management
step5.description: Get access to all important data on the day of the event, share tasks with team members, and document special moments in the digital event journal. Even after the event, you'll be able to send thanks to guests and vendors and summarize your successful event.
